alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Blowing Dust Advisory issued October 01 at 1:44PM MDT until October 01 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...BLOWING DUST ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT /7 PM CDT/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Visibility between one quarter mile and one mile in blowing dust. * WHERE...In Colorado, Yuma, Kit Carson and Cheyenne Counties. In Nebraska, Dundy and Hitchcock Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT /7 PM CDT/ this evening. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong southerly winds gusting around 50 mph will continue throughout the remainder of the afternoon. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. Remember, Pull Aside, Stay Alive.

area.areaDesc: Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County
